title: Add contact section and welcome popup modal

requirements.text: Add a Contact Us section to the homepage displaying contact information such as email address and social media links

quotes: Add a section for contact us

acceptanceCriteria: Contact section is visible on the homepage
Section includes at least an email address field
Contact information is clearly formatted and readable
Section follows the existing IPL-themed design with cricket blue and energetic orange colors

requirements.text: Implement a popup modal that appears automatically when a user first opens the website to collect contact details

quotes: when someone open a site pop up show up toh the person for contact details

acceptanceCriteria: Modal appears automatically on initial site load
Modal includes form fields for collecting contact details (name, email, phone number)
Modal has a clear close button or dismiss action
Modal prevents interaction with background content until dismissed
Modal follows the IPL-themed design aesthetic
Modal should only appear once per session or use localStorage to avoid repeated displays

constraints: Do not modify backend/main.mo as contact collection does not require backend storage at this stage
Maintain the existing IPL-themed color scheme and design language
Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Backend storage or processing of contact form submissions
Contact form validation beyond basic HTML5 validation
Integration with third-party CRM or email services
